definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: Blood should be administered as indicated.
Objective To analyze the etiological factors and antibiotics application in infantile diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析婴幼儿腹泻的病因及抗生素的使用指征。

sentences.english: The social factor rose to the first.
sentences.chinese: 剖宫产指征中社会因素上升到首位。

sentences.english: Objective To describe the reasons for pregnant women choosing cesarean section without medical indication.
sentences.chinese: 目的深入探讨无剖宫产指征孕妇选择剖宫产的原因。

sentences.english: Methods The indications of cesarean section that took place in hospitals both in city and in the country were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法对城乡两所医院剖宫产指征进行了回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Pla cental disorder was the main indication of emergency hysterectomy.
sentences.chinese: 胎盘因素是产科急症子宫切除术的主要指征。

sentences.english: Loss of dexterity is generally accepted as visible indicators of alcohol-induced intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 肢体灵活性的丧失通常被认为是酒精影响的醉酒指征。

sentences.english: Although the surgical outcome is satisfactory, the indications for nonoperative treatment for this condition are not clear.
sentences.chinese: 虽然手术结果满足，但是其非手术指征尚不清楚。

sentences.english: The social factor became the first cause of cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 剖宫产指征中社会因素上升到首位。

sentences.english: Objective To study the advantage and indication of transventral approach in the treatment of cardiac cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究经腹入路治疗胃底贲门癌的获益和指征。

sentences.english: Recombinant tissue-type plasminogen activator (r-TPA) was also used when clinically indicated.
sentences.chinese: 临床上有指征时也可应用重组组织型纤溶酶原激活剂。

sentences.english: Early intervention needs clear and defi- nite indication combined with consideration of pending respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 早期干预应掌握指征并结合呼吸衰竭趋势。

sentences.english: To explore operative indication and surgical management of sliding esophageal hiatal hernia .
sentences.chinese: 探讨滑动型食管裂孔疝的手术指征和术中要点。

sentences.english: The effect of epidemic meningitis vaccine and the epidemic indication of epidemic cerebrospinal meningitis were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 并对流脑菌苗的效果和流脑流行指征进行了分析。

child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
